statements: SELECT * FROM Geofencing;
SELECT geofence_id, location_name, marketing_message FROM Geofencing;
SELECT location_name, radius_in_meters FROM Geofencing WHERE radius_in_meters > 100;
SELECT * FROM Geofencing WHERE location_name LIKE 'Star%';
SELECT location_name, radius_in_meters FROM Geofencing ORDER BY radius_in_meters DESC;
SELECT * FROM Geofencing WHERE geofence_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, radius_in_meters FROM Geofencing WHERE radius_in_meters > 100;
SELECT * FROM Geofencing ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT geofence_id, location_name, marketing_message FROM Geofencing WHERE marketing_message LIKE '%special%' ORDER BY geofence_id DESC;
SELECT geofence_id, location_name FROM Geofencing WHERE radius_in_meters BETWEEN 50 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM geofence_areas;
SELECT area_name, center_latitude, center_longitude FROM geofence_areas WHERE id = 1;
SELECT trigger_message, radius FROM geofence_areas ORDER BY trigger_message ASC;
SELECT center_latitude, center_longitude FROM geofence_areas WHERE radius > 10 ORDER BY radius DESC;
SELECT area_name, trigger_message FROM geofence_areas WHERE center_latitude < 40.0 AND center_longitude > -75.0;
SELECT id, area_name FROM geofence_areas;
SELECT * FROM geofence_areas WHERE radius > 10;
SELECT area_name, center_latitude, center_longitude FROM geofence_areas ORDER BY area_name ASC;
SELECT trigger_message FROM geofence_areas WHERE id = 3;
SELECT user_id, latitude, longitude FROM user_locations WHERE last_update >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_update DESC;
SELECT * FROM Geofence WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, latitude, longitude FROM Geofence WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT id, user_id, timestamp FROM UserLocations ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT message, timestamp FROM MarketingMessages WHERE geofence_id = 2;
SELECT id, name, latitude, longitude FROM Geofence WHERE longitude < -100;
SELECT * FROM Geofence WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, latitude, longitude FROM Geofence WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT id, user_id, timestamp FROM UserLocations ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT message FROM MarketingMessages WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT id, message, timestamp FROM MarketingMessages WHERE geofence_id IN (SELECT id FROM Geofence WHERE latitude < 30);
SELECT * FROM geofence_areas;
SELECT area_name, latitude, longitude FROM geofence_areas WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_locations WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT message_text, timestamp FROM messages ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT user_id, message_text, timestamp FROM messages WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, area_name, latitude, longitude FROM geofence_areas WHERE latitude BETWEEN 20.5 AND 40.2 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT user_id, latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM user_locations WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM geofences;
SELECT geofence_name, latitude, longitude FROM geofences WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT message_id, message_text, start_date FROM marketing_messages WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT preference_id, receive_messages, receive_notifications FROM user_preferences WHERE receive_messages = true;

SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT geofence_name, latitude, longitude FROM geofences WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100;
SELECT user_id, receive_messages FROM user_preferences WHERE receive_notifications = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, message_text FROM marketing_messages WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-02-01';
